headline: ExchangeRight’s $41 Million All-Cash 12 DST Fully Subscribed, Fueling Essential Income REIT Pipeline
summary: PASADENA, Calif., September 09, 2025--ExchangeRight, one of the nation’s leading providers of diversified real estate DST and REIT investments, has announced the full subscription of Net-Leased All-Cash 12 DST, reflecting strong demand for the company’s historically recession-resilient, diversified net-leased offerings that support the growing acquisition pipeline for ExchangeRight’s Essential Income REIT.
